name: Kazoozee's Minesweeper Clone
description: Through out the year of 2019 I plan to release a game once per week. This minesweeper clone is for the first week of this challenge.  I wanted to make sure that the first game of the challenge showcased the limits of my abilities. I am rather proud of the project and am really looking forward to comparing it with my submissions in a month or two.   I will also be releasing a youtube video to go along with it over at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuI9aqy-pdD8H0Cz1dUCe0Q
